articles.description: Dr Lal PathLabs' Q1FY24 net profit surged 44% YoY to INR84 crore due to the rise in non-Covid testing and higher realisations, while non-Covid revenue advanced 10% YoY. In comparison, the pathology chain had posted a net profit of INR58 crore in the correspon…
articles.content: Dr Lal PathLabs on Thursday reported a 44% year-on-year (YoY jump in net profit to Rs 84 crore in the first quarter ended June 30, 2023 led by growth in non-covid testing and higher realizations.Dr L… [+1219 chars]
